attributes.action: Provide all small companies not entitled to existing support a grant of £25,000
attributes.additional_details:
Just when small companies need urgent support during the current Covid19 pandemic & lockdown many have been excluded by ridiculous government set eligibility criteria from:
 
1. £10,000 cash rate grants
2. £15,000 (6 months x £2,500) furlough employee support grants
3. Covid19 business interruption loans scheme
 
So the government as a minimum must urgently offer small micro UK Limited companies that have corporation tax filing history but are not entitled to existing schemes with cash grants of £25,000.
attributes.background: Provide all small companies that have corporation tax filing history but have not been able to access the £10,000 rate grant or the 6-months furloughed employee support of £15,000 a cash grant of £25,000.
